description: This loop trail encircles Lake of the Woods, traveling through a variety of forest types, from old growth stands to elevated outcrops.  These outcrops offer excellent views of Silver Peak, six kilometers to the west and Lake of the Woods below.  At one point, the trail descends to the lakeshore where a short boardwalk connects to the lake's only island.
directions: This trail is located in Killarney Provincial park and requires a Day Use Permit. These can be obtained at the George and Bell Lake access points.The Lake of the Woods Trail can be accessed from Bell Lake Road. From Sudbury travel south on Highway 69 to Highway 637 to Bell Lake Road.From the George Lake Campground Office travel east along Highway 637.  Travel for about 21km and turn left onto Bell Lake Road.  Follow along Bell Lake Road for about 7km.  The access to the Lake of the Woods Trail is on the left hand side of the road, across from the portage into Turbid Lake.
title: Lake of the Woods
